thread.title: Clearview Resources Ltd. Announces Change of President

author: cnbc.com
title: Clearview Resources Ltd. Announces Change of President
text:
CALGARY, Alberta, March 05, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Clearview Resources Ltd. (“Clearview”) announces that Gregory Baum has resigned from his positions of officer and a director of Clearview effective immediately in order to pursue new opportunities.
Clearview is presently negotiating a potential merger with another junior oil and gas company which if completed would result in its President & CEO becoming the President & CEO of the merged entity.
The Board of Directors of Clearview have appointed Steven Glover, the present CFO of Clearview, to act as President & CEO until the mentioned merger is completed or a replacement President & CEO is found.
The Board of Directors of Clearview sincerely wish to thank Greg for leading Clearview since its reorganization as an oil and gas company in 2010 and through the recent transition to a growth oriented company.
Information regarding Clearview is available on Sedar at www.sedar.com . For further information contact Steven Glover, President of Clearview at (403) 265-3503 or steven@clearviewres.com .
Source:Clearview Resources Ltd.
